work.name: Brain Station 23
work.summary: Developed and maintained Internet Banking and Digital Wallet applications using Java, RDBMS, REST API, and event-driven architecture.
highlights: Optimized production environments on Linux servers
Implemented high-performance caching solutions using Redis

work.name: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, BRAC University
work.summary: Conducted research on federated learning with adversarial robustness and medical image analysis.
highlights: Designed and implemented medical image classifiers
Experimented with adversarial attacks and aggregation methods
Developed a Vision Transformer-based disease detection model
Applied Paillier homomorphic encryption in federated learning

volunteer.summary: Mentored new joiners, organized events, and participated in robotics competitions.
highlights: Participated in Soccer Bot Competition, MindSparks 20

publications.name: Byzantine-Resilient Federated Learning Leveraging Confidence Score to Identify Retinal Disease
publications.publisher: 2023 International Conference on Digital Image Computing: Techniques and Applications (DICTA)

references.name: Dr. Mohammad Zavid Parvez
references.reference: Lecturer, RMIT University, Australia. Assistant Professor (Former), Department of Computer Science and Engineering, BRAC University.

references.name: Tanzim Reza
references.reference: Senior Lecturer, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, BRAC University.

references.name: Md. Hafizur Rahman Arfin
references.reference: Software Engineer, MarginEdge. Senior Software Engineer (Former), Brain Station 23.

projects.name: Encrypted Federated Learning for Detecting Skin Lesions
projects.summary: Explored image augmentation methods like SMOTE to handle class imbalance and applied a BFV-based homomorphic system in federated learning.

projects.name: Malaria-Infected Cell Classifier using Vision Transformer
projects.summary: Developed a Vision Transformer model achieving 95.48% accuracy for malaria-infected cell classification.

projects.name: Explainable Neural Network for Alzheimer’s Disease Analysis
projects.summary: Trained a classifier using InceptionV3 and VGG19 and incorporated regional explanations using LIME.

projects.name: Internet Banking Solution
projects.summary: Developed scalable microservices-based Internet banking solutions for AB Bank, Modhumoti Bank, and NCC Bank.

projects.name: Digital Wallet
projects.summary: Designed and maintained a digital wallet for ABG Pocket, enhancing system performance and user experience.
